H1.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Hotaru Tomoe

H2.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Chibiusa

H3.text: who has the talismans in sailor moon s. Haruka

A4.text: Her talisman, the Deep Aqua Mirror, aids her intuition and reveals cloaked evil.

A5.text: Her talisman, the Space Sword, aids her fighting.

A6.text: Neptune has the Deep Aqua Mirror.
